#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>

long long int scan(){
    long long int t=0;
    char c;
    c=getchar();
    while(c<'0' || c>'9')
        c=getchar();
    while(c>='0' && c<='9'){
        t=(t<<3)+(t<<1)+c-'0';
        c=getchar();
    }
    return(t);

}

int main()
{
    long long int n;

    while(scanf("%lld",&n)!=EOF)
         printf("%lld\n",n-1);


    return 0;
}
